sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
falters
, postane šibkejše ali počasnejše in se bo morda povsem ustavilo ali prenehalo.

seg.quote: The engines faltered and the plane lost height.

sense.def:
To falter
pomeni oklevati in postati negotov ali omahljiv.

seg.quote: From that moment onwards he never faltered in his resolve.
Looking to his left, he saw Percy faltering.
